  • PROTECT YOURSELF FROM REGRETS THE MORNING AFTER, Connecticut Law Tribune, April, 1999
description:
How Can We Help You?

With approximately 100 years of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm believe in offering our clients the highest quality legal services. We also promote professional responsibility by holding negligent professionals responsible, whether they are in the medical, accounting, legal, architectural, or engineering fields.

We have the in-depth legal knowledge and practical skill to take on even the most imposing opponent. Whether a client has suffered from legal or professional malpractice, is dealing with a business dispute, is involved in a contested divorce, was injured in an auto accident, is forming a business or not-for-profit, or has another legal concern, we are passionate about making a lasting difference.

Our law firm strives to provide every client with the individualized attention he or she deserves. In addition, we develop cost-effective solutions. In many cases, this means exploring alternative dispute resolution (ADR) methods such as mediation or arbitration instead of litigation. Past clients have expressed their deep appreciation for our approach and our results.

To set up an initial consultation with one of our lawyers, call StangerLaw, LLC, in West Hartford today.
